net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.sdp
Class Session

java.lang.Object
  net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.sdp.Session

public class Session
extends java.lang.Object

This class makes use of all the streaming package. It represents a streaming session between a client and the phone. A stream is designated by the word "track" in this class. To add tracks to the session you need to call addVideoTrack() or addAudioTrack().

setContext

public void setContext(Context context)
Reference to the context is needed to aquire a MulticastLock. If the Session has a multicast destination is address such a lock will be aquired.

Parameters:
A - reference to the application context

setOrigin

The origin address of the session. It appears in the sessionn description.

Parameters:
origin - The origin address

setDestination

public void setDestination(java.net.InetAddress destination)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
The destination address for all the streams of the session. You must stop all tracks before calling this method.

Parameters:
destination - The destination address
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException

setTimeToLive

public void setTimeToLive(int ttl)
Set the TTL of all packets sent during the session. You must call this method before adding tracks to the session.

Parameters:
ttl - The Time To Live
